title: More snow, freezing rain to fall Friday
description: Another messy winter storm bringing snow, ice pellets and freezing rain is on its way to New Brunswick.
content: Another messy winter storm bringing snow ice pellets and freezing rain is on its way to New Brunswick It s going to bring just about everything across the province said Tina Simpkin CBC s meteorologist Campbellton and Restigouche County Edmundston chars
